metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8781 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
tif_luv.c in libtiff allows attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds write) via an invalid number of samples per pixel in a LogL compressed TIFF image, a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-8782.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8781` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1').
